评论详情: I LOVE this jacket, I wear it all the time. People often think its lululemon. I have several lululemon jackets and this one is holding up fairly well quality wise. I have washed it several times and it still looks good. Its nice and warm and has a good oversized fit.

Love this!  material thick and warm, purchased the orange for my husband's 31 Oct birthday party cookout, it looks fantastic on me,  got many comments on it.  I put it on when it's cold outside and I don't want the hassle of a coat.  Love it.

I love this color! The size was great, I did get a Large and I usually wear an XL but either size would have worked. It is still a little oversized with the large so if you want it more oversized then I would go with your normal size. The color is great and matches my daughter’s volleyball team colors perfectly so I love that. I have worn it a few times, washed it and the color did slightly fade but it still looks great! Would definitely get this in other colors as well.

Comfy and true to size sweatshirt! I purchased the purple, and the color matches exactly as pictured. My only complaint is that the the sleeves are just the slightest bit too short to sue the thumb holes comfortably. I'm only 5'2" and have short arms, so this usually isn't an issue. However, in this sweatshirt, when I use them, and I bend my arms at all, they tug on my thumbs. Really not a big deal, but for the price, this shouldn't be happening.
The sweatshirt is super thick. But its hard and the seams are uncomfortable on the inside.
I'm tall and I have a long upper body's and long arms. It fits perfectly. Covers my butt too. So soft thick great quality live the pink color and supper flattering.
Thick material high quality
Good quality sweatshirt, but the wrong color was delivered or the color that is shown is not accurate. The color that arrived is a sage green and it was displayed as light blue.
Love this top super warm.
So cute a little oversize but does shrink a bit when you wash it
I love these sweaters. Ordered in 4 different colors. Definitely recommend
Love the look! I sized up one size and it’s perfect. Nice and cozy for a cold day.
This took a couple weeks to get to me but it was worth it! It’s warm, very comfortable and I got at least 3 compliments on it the first time I wore it. I’m ordering another color now.
I purchased in pink, lovely color. It is very ‘stiff’ feeling, even after a few washes. Because of that, the collar is bothersome.  Fabric is thick. Didn’t shrink much when laundered.
Love this! Resisting the urge to buy in every color!
This is what I have been looking for. Something easy to throw on and comfortable. Not super thick but nice enough to keep warm. Love the oversize look to it.
High quality! Soft and well made

This sweatshirt is so cute on the model. Maybe it's because I'm not model-thin, but this sweatshirt did not look good on me at all. It's super box and bulky, making my shoulders look wide. The fabric felt stiff and uncomfortable, but maybe that would get better after a wash. I won't know because I sent it back. 2 stars for the color--it's very pretty and true to photo.
The fabric is soft and very warm, not too heavy .

评论概述: I ordered my size. But it was TOO thick.
评论详情: I wore this, but it was difficult getting it on & off. The half zipper in the front should have been longer because I had difficulty getting it on & off, even though I bought my size.  It was also very warm to wear indoors. It could be a plus for some, but too hot for me.
Great quality and so comfy! I often get asked if it’s a Lululemon sweatshirt. You can’t tell the difference.

The look and color of the sweatshirt is as shown in the pictures.  This is a heavy weight sweatshirt and good quality material with thumb holes which is a plus for us short ladies.  Good price for the quality and weight of the material.  Oversized fit, so if you are looking for something less bulky I would size down. I do not dry most of my clothes so I cannot speak the shrinkage.  It’s not as soft and cozy as I had hoped so that’s why I marked it down to four stars.
Very thick but stiff. Even after washing- just large and immovable.

评论概述: Quality and fit are on point!
评论详情: I ordered this on a whim and it’s become my go-to top for casual days. It’s made of a nice weight material- warm but not overly bulky. The color is versataile and the seams are well sewn. It did seem to shrink a little on first wash, so fake that into account when ordering. This is great quality for the price!
This sweatshirt is great. It’s thick, soft, and the color is beautiful. It’s definitely oversized so I would order down.
I love this it's oversized but somehow still flattering.
The quality is about what you'd expect for the price. The color, however, is more light and slightly orangish-yellow. Not the deep beige in the pic. Because of this, it doesn't look great.

Love this…warm, thick and comfy. The fabric is a high quality, thick, soft grade. Washes like a charm. Love the fit,,,,with cuff thumb slits to add extra warmth. I ordered a larger size for added comfort. Normally wear M, ordered L, and there is lots of room. M probably would have worked as product is noted as oversized.

I purchased both the medium and the large to see which size I preferred. For reference, I'm 5'7", 150lbs, athletic build. The medium fit perfectly fine and I almost kept it, but ultimately decided to go with the large for a more oversized fit. With the medium, the sleeves came to my wrists but were slightly too short to comfortably use the thumbholes (if you don't plan on using the thumbholes you'll be fine). Ultimately, I'm very happy that I went with the large. It's super comfy and cozy. So far I've washed this twice on the cold cycle, then I laid flat to dry to minimize shrinkage. So far it's holding up well.

I am 5’ 3”, 145 lbs. 34DD. I typically wear a medium. I ordered the small and it fit well. Didn’t cover my butt so I would go bigger if you want to wear with leggings. HOWEVER, it was stained with grease. I read in another review that the sweater came stained but I chalked it up to a one and done. NOPE. Grease spots. I thought I could get it out with Shout / pre-treating with Tide detergent. Also, I tried Dawn dish soap. A lot of it came out but not all. I like the sweater but I am kinda disappointed.
So cute love it

I just received the mushroom color and love it. The fit is great, oversized but not bulky. I’m 5’11, 175 pounds and the large was perfect. I have the Lululemon version and actually like this better.  It doesn’t completely cover my bottom but close. Wish they had more colors.

I absolutely love these pullovers! I have this red one and the gray cropped full zip both in a size small. Both fit perfectly oversized even though I am 37 weeks pregnant. I am definitely going to be ordering more. Also both are pretty warm and perfect for the colder months where I live.

Great quality, very warm, thick fleece material. Not cheap at all! I’m 5’6” 125 lbs and ordered a large just to make sure it was oversized and long enough to wear with leggings. It’s exactly what I wanted! Definitely recommend!
Love this so much!! Super comfy and cute
Great quality, soft, medium weight and fits oversized if you order your normal size.

I’m 5’6 and this barely covered my butt, before the top was washed.  The stitched area were thick and stiff, so not the cozy, buttery soft, longer top I was looking for to wear with leggings, so I returned it.  Return was easy.
Was so soft and thicker than I thought it would be. As in the quality was so much better than I thought it would be. Daughter loved it.
My sweatshirt came with a stain and clearly used.
My sister-in-law got this for Christmas and she absolutely loved it. It’s thick and warm and super cute.
Great for a trip to NYC , New York

I absolutely loved this sweater, but had to return because it was too long. I’m 5’2, 113lbs, and have a 25 inch waist. I got size small. It definitely feels oversized, which I love. The arm length and everything was perfect. The length of it though was past halfway my thighs so it made my legs look really short. It’s a bummer because it’s a great sweater. The quality feels thick, the inside is very soft and warm. For the price I think it’s worth it if on sale. If you have a longer torso or on the taller side, it’ll fit you great!
Love this pullover! So soft and warm.  Sizing was spot on.
Stains easily and  more of a knit feel than a typical cotton sweatshirt.  Very pretty.
Very good quality. Super soft inside!
Great pullover! A little oversized but perfect to wear with leggings or to school. Color is beautiful and does not look cheap at all. Great quality! Super soft!
LOVE this sweatshirt!!! I have 3 different colors!
Awkward sizing and shape. Really dislike the cut.
I'm almost 6 ft tall and it's hard to find clothing on the longer side so I can wear leggings. The photo us very misleading, it's short and not a dark red like in the photo, but a red red.

This was bought for a Christmas gift and I was present when the recipient undid the package. It was embarrassing when she opened the gift and the zipper tab was broken into two pieces. This had to have happened before placed in a vacuum type package, either that or during the packaging process.  Good quality otherwise but the zipper needs to work.  As it is, the product is worthless.

I received my item without tags, tried it on and it had been worn previously by a smoker. I worked retail previously, and know that it’s likely that you might buy/receive something tried on by another person, but the smoke smell was strong.  I liked the sweatshirt and loved the color, so I washed it and kept it. Only complaint about the actual garment is that the thumb holes aren’t really functional. Too much fabric between the hole and the end of the cuff to make it comfortable, and the sleeves could be a little longer - but I often have this issue with shirts as I’m tall and my arms are long.

SO warm and soft on the inside. This is probably one of the best articles of clothing I've bought on Amazon. The material is thick and I love the neutal color of it. It fits true to size as well. It's been washed a few times and it hasn't strank at all but I hang dry it so i dont know what would happen if its put in the dryer. Highly recommend you buy this!
It's very soft and comfortable.

Love this sweatshirt very soft amazing quality a very nice medium weight sweatshirt material great value for the money it has pockets. This is not a cropped sweatshirt. It is full length it hits below my waist. Like the others it has thumb holes on the wrist bands.. I will definitely be buying more of these.
Love this sweatshirt!! It's thick, soft and cozy!!!
Great fit, value for money, love the pockets
Hole in my shirt when received.
Cute and has that baggy fit. Just wish it was as long as pictured. I'll keep it, since I like the color.
I'm so happy with my purchase! Don't question yourself! Buy it! You need it!
The quality is great, the material is worth it and it is comfortable..  You have a lot of room in it .
Such great quality and I love the fit!!!! I want to buy it in more colors.
Although the item is thick and soft, it is definitely not the tunic length item shown in the sales picture.
This sweatshirt is gorgeous. I’ve gotten so many compliments. It’s a nice, think material and is very warm. The quality is amazing for the price. I’m going to buy other colors.

I would love it and give 5 stars if it wasn’t for the short sleeves. It’s annoying AF and makes the thumb holes pointless! I’m 5’6” and got the Large… wishing I got the XL as it definitely shrunk after the first wash.
So stylish, comfy and warm. I wear it almost every day. Bought a second one
So soft! A bit oversized but not too much. Nice quality.

I’m 5”10 225 lbs I got an Xl and honestly it’s almost a tight fit, still cute but not the look I was expecting. Keeping it definitely because like I said, very cute. Just not the loose baggy look really.
This is one of my favorite sweatshirts. It fits a little large and is a bit boxy.  It is not fitted.  I’m 5’9’ and weigh 120 and small is a little large but I still like and wear it a lot.

This is super comfy and cute sweatshirt for the fall season! One thing I wish the sleeves were longer, especially with the thumb holes I can’t really ever use them because the sleeves aren’t long enough. Other than short sleeves, it’s good
Makes a person look like a pumpkin 🥺

I was this on delicate cycle by itself and laid flat to dry .. it shrunk up the sleeves are very short ... the sweat shirt is coming unstitched.  I bought it before the cold weather so the return date was passed  A waste of money.  Don't buy
Great fit! Warm and cozy!!
The material is nice and thick and the pockets are deep enough for my hands, phone, wallet, etc.  I wish the zipper was a bit better quality, but overall love and ordering another.

Love love love this cozy roomy winter must have sweatshirt!great price! got smaller size knowing it was oversized style . Had to have 4 colors live in these all winter very  soft inside warm and versatile. The fabric is heavy weight perfect for winter in Nor. Cal. 36*  keeps me warm without a jacket. Has a quality zipper to adjust as needed for warmer days. Have not washed yet hoping it does wash well.
Loved this sweatshirt until the second wash. Then all of a sudden it had spots all over it.

I love this sweatshirt! It’s thick, soft, super cozy, and cute. I’m 5’5 120lbs and bought a medium (I’m usually a small) because I wanted it to be oversized and I wanted to be able to throw it in the dryer without worrying about it shrinking too much. I’ll be buying again in another color!
Exceeded expectations. Great Lulu dupe. So many compliments, cozy, casual and a bit more classy than the sweatshirts I’d typically through on. I want one in every color!

This sweatshirt exceeded my expectations! It is very good quality, very thick, fits perfectly. I purchased after seeing it on sale on Instagram and thinking it was cute- then one day I was wearing it and my teens said I looked like I was wearing a popular expensive brand. So I guess now I’m thrifty and cool!!

It's a nice thick heavy sweatshirt, which is nice in the cold weather. BUT it's a thick heavy sweatshirt and not as soft and cozy as it looks in the picture.  It runs very small- if you want an oversized fit as their photos show I recommend sizing up at least 2 sizes.
Too big and bulky for me.  I returned this item.

This sweatshirt is a light to medium weight. It’s very soft and warm. I’m normally a size small, sometimes a medium, and I sized up to a medium with this to ensure it was oversized enough and that the sleeves were long enough (I have longer arms). I’m 5’6, 140 lbs. The medium is perfect! It fits like the model and the sleeves are long enough for me to use the thumb holes. A small probably would have been oversized but I like the way this looks. Would definitely recommend!
Cute & comfy!!!

评论概述: Overall amazing, sleeves a tad short
评论详情: I got this a week ago and have worn it 4 times if that tell you how much I love it. It looks great, the color is accurate, great material, and comfy. The only reason I gave 4 stars and not 5 is that the sleeves are a tad too short. They aren’t so short that it looks bad, but enough that when wearing a jacket that pulls the sweatshirt into my armpits my wrists are exposed. I’m 5’6 with I think “normal” length arms and ordered a small for reference. If I was starting over I might try a medium for that reason, though it fits perfectly elsewhere
Much better quality than I expected.  Fits well.  Very warm and cozy.

I really like how it's true to size and soft. I have already washed it a couple of times and no shrinkage. I like the oversize sweatshirt look and feel especially when you just want something baggy and comfortable to lounge in. I also liked the zipper wasn't the cheap plastic and its metal. The deep pockets was a plus as well.
Cute and comfy! I accidentally ordered a size too large but I actually enjoy it being oversized.
Comfortable, oversize, pockets & nice quality. A bit on the warmer/thicker side.
Amazing sweater
It is very warm for Winter! I liked it!
Great top for the price!  Great quality!
I have been looking for a sweatshirt and this one surpasses everything I wanted in a sweatshirt. It’s a perfect, the fabric is very soft. I highly recommend it.

This one is decently heavy.. fits as expected oversize and comfy and cozy. Soft cotton type material.  Love the color got the tan. Washs gentle with cold and hang to dry and it isn't pilly:) decently cheap for how yummy it is. Stylish for sure 😎
Love the color, it has pockets.  The sweatshirt is thick…..  will be great for a cold day.  Very happy with this purchase!
If you’re in the market for a new sweatshirt, this is the one! It’s so soft and thick, and feels way higher quality than the price would indicate. I absolutely love it and plan to buy more!
I bought in a large for oversized fit, could have gone with medium. Super cute and comfortable !
I love this sweatshirt! It goes great with leggings or jeans

I purchased this sweatshirt along with a pair of Automet sweatpants to complete the outfit. The sweatshirt is soft and very comfortable. The downside is that this sweatshirt and the sweatpants are different "whites" and cannot be worn together as an outfit.
Faded into a grey orange after about 2 washes.
Love this sweatshirt but it does run big in my opinion.
This is so soft and way thicker than I expected.  Great quality for the money!
